categoryQuotes.Early Life & Background: The roots of who we are lie in the soil of our beginnings.
categoryQuotes.School & Education: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
categoryQuotes.Growing Up & School: In learning you will teach, and in teaching you will learn.
categoryQuotes.Teenage Years & Young Adulthood: Youth is not a time of life; it is a state of mind.
categoryQuotes.Young Adulthood & Coming of Age: The youth of today are the leaders of tomorrow.
categoryQuotes.Love & Relationships: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
categoryQuotes.Love & Marriage: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
categoryQuotes.Family & Relationships: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
categoryQuotes.Relationships & Family: The love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
categoryQuotes.Becoming a Mother: A mother's love is the fuel that enables a normal human being to do the impossible.
categoryQuotes.Becoming a Father: Any man can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad.
categoryQuotes.Becoming a Parent & Grandparent: To the world you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.
categoryQuotes.Career & Work: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
categoryQuotes.Career & Work Life: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
categoryQuotes.Career & Life Path: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
categoryQuotes.Life Lessons & Values: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate.
categoryQuotes.Life Lessons & Wisdom: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
categoryQuotes.Life Lessons & Reflections: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
categoryQuotes.Challenges & Triumphs: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
categoryQuotes.Passions & Hobbies: Find what you love and let it kill you.
categoryQuotes.Hobbies, Passions & Everyday Life: Life is made of small moments like this.
categoryQuotes.Work, Passions & Interests: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
categoryQuotes.Everyday Life & Memories: Life is not measured by the breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
categoryQuotes.Reflections on Life: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
categoryQuotes.Messages for Me: If I could give you one thing in life, I would give you the ability to see yourself through my eyes.
categoryQuotes.Messages for Family: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
categoryQuotes.Growing Up Together: Side by side or miles apart, siblings will always be connected by heart.
categoryQuotes.Your Life & Journey: Life is a journey, not a destination.
categoryQuotes.Our Relationship & Messages: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
categoryQuotes.Looking Forward: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
categoryQuotes.Historical Perspective & Changes: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
